data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 17,890 believers living in Kaimur, Bihar, India.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kaimur, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Kaimur, Bihar, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Kaimur, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Kaimur, Bihar, India the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Lohar Kamti people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, the believers in the county of Kaimur, Bihar, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Kaimur that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Kaimur, Bihar, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

location.name: Kaimur
location.people_groups_list: Rajbhar, Nagarchi (Muslim traditions), Beg, Rajput Dikhit, Musahar (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Rajbhar (73,000), Nagarchi (Muslim traditions) (200), Beg (3,100), Rajput Dikhit (263,000), Musahar (Hindu traditions) (3,014,000)
